name: node-pre-gyp
description: Node.js native addon binary install tool

scripts.pretest: jshint test/build.test.js test/s3_setup.test.js test/versioning.test.js test/fetch.test.js lib lib/util scripts bin/node-pre-gyp
scripts.test: jshint lib lib/util scripts bin/node-pre-gyp && tape test/*test.js
